name: Stem, Inc.
description: Stem, Inc. is a leading provider of artificial intelligence (AI)-driven energy storage services and solutions. Founded in 2010, Stem focuses on helping businesses and utilities manage their energy consumption and costs through advanced battery storage systems. The company's innovative platform uses AI to optimize energy usage, predict demand, and control battery systems to provide energy savings, peak demand reduction, and renewable energy integration. Stem's energy storage solutions are designed to enhance grid reliability and resilience while facilitating the transition to a low-carbon energy future. The company serves a diverse range of customers, including commercial and industrial facilities, as well as utility partners, enabling them to harness the power of clean energy and reduce their carbon footprint. With a strong commitment to sustainability and innovation, Stem is at the forefront of the energy storage revolution, providing critical support to the growing demand for renewable energy.

key_executives.name: Kirsten P. H. S. S. E. W. T. E. A. R. T.

seo.meta_title: Stem, Inc. | AI-Driven Energy Storage Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Stem, Inc., a leader in AI-driven energy storage. Discover how Stem's innovative solutions help businesses and utilities optimize energy consumption and reduce costs.

faq.question: What does Stem, Inc. do?
faq.answer: Stem, Inc. provides AI-driven energy storage solutions to help businesses and utilities manage energy consumption and costs.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Stem, Inc.?
faq.answer: John Carrington is the CEO of Stem, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Stem headquartered?
faq.answer: Stem is headquartered in San Francisco, California, USA.

faq.question: What are Stem's main products?
faq.answer: Stem's main products include AI-powered energy storage systems and grid services.
